department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and Install Audio-Video equipment systems at - PDPIII
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement for the supply and installation of audio-video systems at Place du Portage III, Courcelette Street, Gatineau, Quebec by October 2024. There is a mandatory site visit December 14, 2022
tags: AD1 (Electronics), AD (Electronics Supplies and Materials), OT (Services and Software)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
### Supply and Installation of Audio-Video Equipment Systems

**Reference:** WS3589519821-Doc3595833908

**Publication Date:** Thursday, November 28, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, February 28, 2023 (14:00:00 EST)

**Background:** Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites requests for proposals (RFP) from qualified contractors to supply and install audio-visual systems and equipment at Place du Portage III, Courcelette Street, Gatineau, Quebec, by October 2024.

**Key Requirements:**

*   Supply and installation of audio-visual systems and equipment
*   Mandatory site visit on December 14, 2022
*   Expected contract start date: December 30, 2022
*   Expected contract end date: July 12, 2023

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**

*   The tender is open to all qualified contractors
*   The selection criteria for this RFP are based on lowest price

**Submission Requirements:**

*   Responses must be submitted electronically through the online portal
*   Proposals must be received by February 28, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

**Contact Information:**

*   Louie Turner, PSPC
*   Email: [louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Important:**

*   This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   The Government of Canada reserves the right to reject any or all proposals

**For more information and to access the tender documents, please visit the online portal:**

[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14753102?extsite=MTQ3NTMxMDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14753102?extsite=MTQ3NTMxMDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).instructions:
